Keywords: Codex , Monster , X-Men
Real Name: Scott Summers
Special Powers
TARGETING: Adjacent
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Cyclops is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, he can't be targeted by range attacks.
EVERYTHING CHANGING: KNOCKBACK.

Comments
January 5, 2022
Disasstah
[QUOTE=Hellboy the Bellboy;12175026]@The Singularity I try to find the silver lining with every piece and I think Disasstah got it right. He's one of 3 options, at the moment, for Venom Dr. Strange at 45 points.[/QUOTE] He's pretty decent for just 35 points. He can always make ranged attacks, his plasticity means he's never getting tied up and he can functionally serve as a tie up piece for a hot second. Super Senses gives him that extra shot at living which is always nice. And at the very least he's an X-Men healing battery. He's a bit better than his dial appears but you really have to finesse him.
January 5, 2022

December 23, 2021
Disasstah
I was going to mark this guy as below average, which his stats and power combination would suggest. However he's the only other person aside from Venom Groot and Venom Magneto that Venom Dr. Strange @ 45 points can bring into the game. Overall his powers seem to lack synergy but they end up working out if he's got some teammates to tie up pieces and help with the Symbiotic Fusion.
